cmd.useronly: Only $1 has access to that command!

cmd.perm.404: you do not have access to that command. Only $1 or higher can access it.

common.user-error: You must specify a user to target with this command

console.received.clearchat: Received a clear chat notification from jtv

console.received.slowmode.end: Received an end slow mode notification from jtv
console.received.slowmode.start: Received a start slow mode ($1) notification from jtv
console.received.subscriberonly.end: Received an end subscribers-only mode notification from jtv
console.received.subscriberonly.start: Received a start subscribers-only mode notification from jtv
init.module.404: That module does not exist or is not loaded!
init.module.auto-disabled: Modules related to the points system have been disabled.
init.module.error: Module "$1" enabled but did not initialize! Check error logs!
init.module.delete.usage: Usage: !module delete [module_name] - Deletes entry from DB! Use for modules removed from disk!
init.module.reload.usage: Usage: !module reload [all / module path] - Force reload all or a single module!
init.blacklist.err: that user is not in the blacklist.
init.mod.toggle.on.pay: moderators+ will now pay for commands.
init.mod.toggle.off.pay: moderators+ will no longer pay for commands.
init.mod.toggle.perm.msg.off: No permission messages have been disabled.
init.mod.toggle.perm.msg.on: No permission messages have been enabled.
init.mod.toggle.price.msg.off: The price message has been disabled.
init.mod.toggle.price.msg.on: The price message has been enabled.
init.toggle.cooldown.msg.on: The cooldown message has been enabled.
init.toggle.cooldown.msg.off: The cooldown message has been disabled.
init.toggle.customCommandAt.on: Enabled targeting no-tag custom commands using !mycommand @user
init.toggle.customCommandAt.off: Disabled targeting no-tag custom commands using !mycommand @user
init.cooldown.msg.global: command !$1 is still on a global cooldown. ($2 seconds left)
init.cooldown.msg.user: command !$1 is still on cooldown for you. ($2 seconds left)
init.toggle.botname: The !$1 command has been $2. !pbcore can always be used to access these commands.
whisper.allowNonModWhispers.disabled: Bot now only responds to whisper commands from moderators.
whisper.allowNonModWhispers.enabled: Bot now responds to whisper commands from all users.

channel.age.user.404: That user is not on Twitch.
